title: Web Development Practical Skill Enhancement: Formalization and Informalization Strategies for Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Identify and explain the three types of formalization (desynchronization, precision, and automation) occurring in online mathematics learning
Write a qualitative research report analyzing the impact of formalization on learners' cognitive development and social interaction
Design and prototype a mathematics learning module incorporating de-formalization strategies (e.g., open-ended task design, flexible feedback systems)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
